summary: The origin of desert rock music - is a feature length documentary about the Californian desert rock and punk rock scene, from which bands like Kyuss and Queens Of The Stone Age arose to kick off its worldwide fame.
cast: Josh Homme|Brant Bjork|Mario Lalli|Alfredo Hernandez|Scott Reeder|Nick Oliveri|Sean Wheeler|Dylan Brown|Chris Cockrell|Tom Davies|Mike Desert|Tony Brown Diprima|Brady Erickson|Bruce Fessier|Damon Garrison|Eddie Glass|Zach Huskey|Herb Lienau|Vince Meghrouni|Nick Nava|Mike Pygmie|Arthur Seay|John Summers|Ian Taylor|Dave Travis
title: Lo Sound Desert
